SEARCH
Package app.src.resources

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
app.src.resources.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bow, Monster
public class Entity extends Object
Creates a Entity that serves as a basis for Monsters and other actors.
See Also:
  • BufferedImage
  • Rectangle

  • Field Details

    • rect

      public Rectangle rect
      Rectangle to track size and location of the Entity

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(String imageName, int x, int y, int health)
      Constructor. Takes an iamge name, coordinates and health value to create an Entity. Loads the image from app/src/resources/assets. Takes width and Height from the image to create a Rectangle
      Parameters:
      imageName - name of the image in app/src/resources/assets
      x - x coodinate for the location
      y - y coodinate for the location
      health - determines how much damage an entity can take before death

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Base Method for extended classes.

    • setMainHitbox

      public void setMainHitbox(int width, int height, int offsetX, int offsetY)
      Creates a Hitbox for basic damage.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the Hitbox
      height - height of the Hitbox
      offsetX - x offset to Entity location
      offsetY - y offset to Entity location

    • registerCritBox

      public void registerCritBox(int width, int height, int offsetX, int offsetY, int multiplier)
      Creates a Hitbox for adjusted damage and adds it to the critBoxes list.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the Hitbox
      height - height of the Hitbox
      offsetX - x offset to Entity location
      offsetY - y offset to Entity location
      multiplier - damage multiplier

    • createHitbox

      public Hitbox createHitbox(int width, int height, int offsetX, int offsetY, int multiplier)
      Creates a Hitbox with size, offsets and damage multiplier.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the Hitbox
      height - height of the Hitbox
      offsetX - x offset to Entity location
      offsetY - y offset to Entity location
      multiplier - multiplier for received damage of this Hitbox
      Returns:
      the created Hitbox object

    • updateHitBoxes

      public void updateHitBoxes(int newX, int newY)
      Takes new coordinates and updates the location of all registered hitboxes.
      Parameters:
      newX - new x corrdinate
      newY - new y corrdinate
